application.doc: Set distributed map storage to Redis

method.name: PUT
method.id: Set distributed map storage to Redis
method.doc: The Distributed Map (or DMap) is a storage location for various collections of distributed shared data. Each entry has a key, value, partition, and expiry time. May include information from the following components: SAML, Key encryption and signing service (KESS), Open ID Connect/OAuth, USC Account Create, USC Password Reset, OTP Retries, FIDO2 Registration and Authentication, AuthSvcClient Context Storage, WS-Federation or IDMappingExtCache(Javascript)
To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the override configs URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
